In this blog post, we will be diving deeper into data visualization. By the end of this post, you will be able to:

1. Create a database that stores tables
2. Utilize SQL to extract necessary data
3. Create a data visualization using `plotly`

This article should be a good exercise for the range of the data visualization process. I will first go through the steps, and then provide additional examples.
